title: PUMA Men's Essentials Fleece Sweatpants (Available in Big & Tall)
description: REGULAR FIT: This garment offers a classic fit that’s neither too tight nor too loose.
ADJUSTABLE WAISTBAND: Designed with an elastic waistband and drawcord for customized comfort.
CONVENIENT SIDE POCKETS: These sweatpants feature inconspicuous side pockets for easy access to your essentials.
SUBTLE BRANDING: The upper left thigh features a descreet PUMA CAT logo, adding a touch of style.

FOREVER BETTER: PUMA is always pushing to be better than we were yesterday. FOREVER BETTER is our commitment to reduce our environmental impact and work together towards a sustainable future. The garment is made with at least 50% recycled material.

Experience ultimate comfort and unrestricted movement with PUMA’s Essentials Fleece Sweatpants. The elastic waistband, complete with an adjustable drawstring, sits securely on your waist, ensuring a snug yet flexible fit. Meanwhile, the subtle PUMA logo adds an iconic touch to your casual ensemble.
